title: Adam Is What I Give
subtitle:
The ancient feed trough
housed a newborn infant
while his mother slept
and recovered
while in our modern times
we leave the trolley empty,
abandoned 
forgetting its purpose: 
to feed those who are in need
clothe the naked
loving our refugee neighbour
as ourselves.
#advent #poempic.twitter.com/TX0yxEI4hX
